recipesJson.name: Qebui's Gust
recipesJson.author: Vurve
recipesJson.description:
Qebui - The Egyptian God of the Northern Wind

Responsible for northern winds that bring about winter.

Whether you enjoy an ice cold vape that will chill you to the bone, or you're sick and want to be able to breathe again, this is the vape for you.

The combination of INW Natural Mint and CAP Cool Mint form a sweet mint flavor that is absolutely delicious. Top it off with a sizeable amount of menthol, and this super simple recipe will have you wondering why you haven't tried something like this sooner.

reviews.text: After many months this remains my go to Menthol/Mint vape and is always in my rotation. One just does not tire of this juice. Thank you for the recipe.

Been chasing a good menthol. Watermelon crack has been my jam...This is, in my opinion, way better than any menthol vape I've tried. So powerful and strong. Delicious sweet taste. Tastes the same throughout the entire day. I will probably only vape this for the rest of my life :) chills you to the bone. Really would like to see some variations
Really satisfying, amazing how you get such a sweet flavor from the mint! I'd love to see more recipes , maybe add some fruits or creams? Maybe I'll try!

Wow! Cap Cool Mint + INW Natural Mint! What a killer combo! Cool, refreshing, and just sweet enough. I didn't have FW Menthol, so I subbed with FE Menthol at the same percentage, and *man*, this is fantastic. I haven't had a good menthol vape in awhile, and I've *definitely* never had one this good.
